name: Beat Me
description:
Beat Me is a simple rhythm game for Android. Just tap the button on the beat and keep the streak for as long as you can.

Features:
- 1 Button
- 4 Tracks
- Like a jillion potential points or something.

Made as part of my 1 Game a Week challenge, check out the tumblr for it here.

The music is all by Eric Matyas from soundimage.org, which is a super helpful resource!

The tracks I used were:
Techno Celebration
Klutzy Goblin March
The Hard Luck Gang
Disco Ants Go Clubbin
